content: **finished sizes ** instructions are given for smaller size with larger size in parentheses when only 1 number is given it applies to both sizes **finished measurements ** circumference approx 19 inches fabric is stretchy length 8 inches small 9 inches large **gauge** 12½ sts and 11 rnds = 4 inches take time to check gauge **materials** madelinetosh tosh dk dk weight 100% super wash merino wool 4 oz/225 yds/205m per skein 1 skein birkenstick size k/10½ 6 5mm crochet hook or size needed to obtain gauge locking stitch markers tapestry needle
